title: Well animu season is almost over so...animu/waifu thread
body:
ehmmm yeah im just here to post animu and waifus as always

https://i.imgur.com/oUdSc65.png

https://i.imgur.com/250zGcU.png

Since the animu of the season is over i just want to say that oh god i really loved that animu, at first i was like ahhh this looks kinda meh but w/e still going to watch it

https://i.imgur.com/MK47Vp8.png

https://i.imgur.com/KkcPTLY.jpg

https://i.imgur.com/kCDGsmE.jpg

https://i.imgur.com/ajCxM5X.jpg

https://i.imgur.com/DtHnedB.png

https://i.imgur.com/tREZFap.png

https://i.imgur.com/VhKhlnA.png

But it just kept getting better and better and then episode 12 and it was sad but still good and i really loved it and and today episode 13 was lovely yes it was a nice ending
